reviews.review_msg: Well, Tamon is the typical research type prof, not really for teaching. He tries to do a good job I think, and tries to help out, but could be confusing sometimes. Doesnt have the best handwriting... But he is a nice guy. Fair exam, talks slow, funny and laid-back.

RECOMMEND! Good prof, lectures run slow but he explains the material clearly. Assignments are a little more difficult than exams but overall he makes the course simple and marking is fair. If you're interested in broad applications of mathematics he's also good for a chat on related topics.
